import re

def get_words_without_vowels(sentence):
    pattern = ''
    words = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
    words_without_vowels = [word for word in words if not re.search('[aeiou]', word, re.IGNORECASE)]
    return words_without_vowels

mutants.original_line: words_without_vowels = [word for word in words if not re.search(r'[aeiou]', word, re.IGNORECASE)]
mutants.mutated_line: words_without_vowels = [word for word in words if not re.search('', word, re.IGNORECASE)]
mutants.code:
import re

def get_words_without_vowels(sentence):
    pattern = '\\b[^\\W\\d_]+\\b'
    words = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
    words_without_vowels = [word for word in words if not re.search('', word, re.IGNORECASE)]
    return words_without_vowels
